text:
Salesforce * San Francisco * Full Time * ONSITE

Salesforce Analytics is looking for frontend developers to build a high-performance ETL (Data Integration) engine that moves and transforms massive amount of data into the Wave Analytics platform. We are a new product from Salesforce, and we're poised to disrupt the Analytics market. Come join us!

http://careers.force.com/jobs/apex/ts2__JobDetails?jobId=a1k...
